question: how to get my moodle id and password
answer: If you completed the college registration form during admission, the university will send your Moodle ID and password to your email.

question: i haven't filled the college registration form what should i do
answer: Please fill the university registration form here: https://admissions.mitsweb.in.

question: i forgot my moodle id
answer: Contact your class coordinator to retrieve your Moodle ID, or check your university email.

question: i forgot my moodle password
answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' option on the Moodle login page. Enter your university email ID and check your inbox for the reset link.

question: my moodle courses are not visible
answer: Contact your course faculty to enroll you in their courses, or reach out to your class coordinator.

question: how to correct my date of birth email or phone number
answer: Contact the student section or email goffice@mitsgwalior.in with proof. You may also call 07512409325.

question: when will ims registration start
answer: IMS registration is currently not open. Keep checking the university website for updates.

question: what is the moodle website address
answer: MITS has two Moodle servers: http://moodle.mitsgwalior.in (before 2024 students) and https://moodle.mitseb.in (2024 students).

question: i am not getting any email for moodle or university email id
answer: All newly admitted students receive Moodle and university email IDs. Contact your class coordinator; default password is your phone number.
